ABOUT_WHO_WE_ARE: From a recharge cards provider to a global End-to-End card solution provider
CAREERS_DESCRIPTION: FutureCard provides employment opportunities for talented people. If you want to make a future for yourself in the card management solution industry, FutureCard is the ideal company for you.
CAREERS_CONTENT: We are continuously looking for new and ambitious people to recruit in different departments of our company. Below you will find our recent job openings. If you cannot find the right position for you, kindly provide us your contact details through the below form and upload your resume.
ABOUT_US_CONTENT_0: FutureCard’s journey of over 17 years started as a member of the ENPI Group in 2002, by delivering recharge cards to telecom operations. Soon the company became certified according to ISO9001 in recognition of quality management standards. In 2002, FutureCard Industries L.L.C was founded and became a certified payment cards manufacturer by Visa and Mastercard. The following years were marked by continuous customer acquisition and significant expansion of the product portfolio from Visa EMV cards to dual-interface, contactless metro, polycarbonated ID - with high security features and health smart cards while introducing HCE, ID and payment cards managed services and solutions. A further milestone achieved by FutureCard was the attainment of the Certificates ISO14001, for Environmental Management and ISO18001, for Occupational Health & Safety. In 2018 FutureCard opened the door to its full-fledged factory with the availability of producing up to 10 million plastic cards monthly.
ABOUT_US_CONTENT_1: Today we are known as a pioneering global End-to-End card solution provider for payments, ID, transport, telecom, loyalty and retail among others. We are serving a demanding market in constant surge with innovative cards, smartcards, as well as card fulfillment services and solutions. Government agencies, financial institutions, telecom operators, corporates and other businesses throughout the world entrust us with the delicate mission of producing secure cards, which carry their brands, identify their clients, and authenticate their transactions.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION: We aspire to exceed the expectations of our customers by demonstrating the highest standards of integrity, professionalism, and dedication to performance excellence.​​
ABOUT_US_FACILITY_CONTENT: Facility size: 7,100 sqm. Factory, personalization bureau, Fulfillment House, In-House Design monthly up to 10 million plastic cards which can include 5 million EMV cards.

ABOUT_OUR_FACILITY: Inform yourself on this page about our facilities and production capacities
ABOUT_US_MARKETS: Since its inception in 2002, FutureCard serves a large customer base in all six continents. Our clients' industries are finance, government, transport, telecom, insurance, healthcare, education, retail, and many more.
ABOUT_US_SOLUTIONS: As an end-to-end card manufacturer, mixing technology with security printing craftsmanship, FutureCard covers the complete value chain of design and manufacturing of secure cards on all kind of substrates: PC, PET-F, PET-G, PVC, ABS, PS, Paper board, etc, allowing to cater for all markets' needs for secure aesthetic cards and smartcards.
ABOUT_US_SERVICES: FutureCard completes its offering with complementary cards services and solutions, positionning itself as a one-stop-shop for all cards needs. Businesses and services providers trust FutureCard with the delicate mission of outsourcing their cards' operations from concept to delivery.
ABOUT_US_CONTENT: FutureCard is a global supplier of innovative cards, smartcards, as well as card-fulfillment services and solutions, serving a demanding market in constant surge. Government agencies, financial institutions, telecom operators, corporates and other businesses throughout the world entrust us with the delicate mission of producing secure cards, which carry their brands, identify their clients, and authenticate their transactions.
APP_DESCRIPTION: Since its inception in 2002, FutureCard is designing, manufacturing and personalizing cards to banks, goverments, operators and retailers around the world.
CARDS_DESCRIPTION: FutureCard customizes each and every card to fit the particular aim the card will be used for… So, when it comes to the technology material, the card material as well as the design and security features, we aim to offer you the best technology, design and functionality to suit your needs.
CARDS_DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: FutureCard has the manufacturing capabilities of below special material and effects:
CARDS_DESIGN_SUBTITLE: Check below our card design options
CARDS_MATERIALS_CONTENT_0: Cards materials are supplied as foils for laminating or as granulates for injection molding of the cards. Card materials are usually no- standard materials and have to be specially adapted for this application. They must fulfill many special criteria for the respective applications of the cards. Our clients have the option to choose between a variety of plastic cards and Metal cards.
CARDS_MATERIALS_CONTENT_1: CONTENT WITH PLASTIC AND METALL CARDS IN TABS
CARDS_MATERIALS_DESCRIPTION: Cards materials are supplied as foils for laminating or as granulates for injection molding of the cards
CARDS_MATERIALS_SUBTITLE: Check below the available material for your cards
CARDS_SUBTITLE: Your card is one of a kind!
CARDS_TECHNOLOGY_CONTENT_0: Advancements in technology paved the way for secure and reliable smart cards that dominate the different sectors of government, transportation, healthcare, retail, telecommunications and financial industries. Depending on the industry and smart card usage, these products are governed by numerous global standards such as ISO, EMVCo, GlobalPlatform, and GSMA among others.
CARDS_TECHNOLOGY_CONTENT_1: Implementation of the latest data encryption standards and physical security features are imperative to verify the authenticity of cardholders, usage and transactions. FutureCard’s facilities and processes are certified and audited by leading industry entities such as PCI, Visa, MasterCard, UPI, GSMA to ensure that all of these technological advancements, procedures and standards are implemented with outstanding quality and security compliance.
CONTACT_SUBTITLE: Thank you for your interest in FutureCard.
LANDING_SUBTITLE: Since its inception in 2002, FutureCard is designing, manufacturing and personalizing cards to banks, goverments, operators and retailers around the world.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_PAYMENT: Governments and public services providers trust FutureCard with the production and personalization of their cards used for identification, voting, transport, and many other public services applications.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_IDENTIFICATION: Being a certified MasterCard™, Visa™, and UnionPay™ card manufacturer, and a certified PCI/DSS card personalization bureau, we serve Banks and financial institutions with all their payment cards needs.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_TRANSPORT_ACCESS: FutureCard serves Mobile and Fixed Telecom Network Operators with hundreds of millions of SIM/USIM, Payphone cards, as well as with variety of scratch recharge vouchers in standard and customized formats.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_TELECOM: Commercial Institutions, retailers and Corporations employ FutureCard in order to reflect their brand image and secure their customers' loyalty in customized cards with a myriad of security and aesthetic features.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_LOYALTY_RETAIL: Commercial Institutions, retailers and Corporations employ FutureCard in order to reflect their brand image and secure their customers' loyalty in customized cards with a myriad of security and aesthetic features.

SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_0: The packaging is as important as the contents inside it, Future Card has an extensive range of products to fit all requirements, and using variety of materials including Cardboard and plastic materials.  You can choose from Variety of packaging options.
SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_1: Cards packed in the traditional fashion using an automated machines with an attractive design and finishing.
SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_2: High End Gift boxes give a satisfaction and allow space for additional information about the cards.
SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_4: One of our bestselling fulfillment packaging in the market we customize your prepaid cards with matching designs and it can contain basic information about the program.
SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_SUBTITLE: Learn more about our packaging systems
SERVICES_PERSONALIZATION_SUBTITLE: We personalize all your cards according to your needs.

SOLUTIONS_END_TO_END_PAYMENT_DESCRIPTION: Today’s Payment market is marked by the latest technology and the most convenient End-to-End solutions to make the customers life easier. We at FutureCard offer the latest technology when it comes to payment and banking.
